abilities.name: Rubbish Collecting
abilities.effect: This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tools attached to it. If it loses this Ability, discard Pokémon Tools from it until only 1 remains.

attacks.name: G-Max Malodor
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During your opponent’s next turn, that Pokémon can’t retreat.
